attributes.action: Help to provide affordable homes to all first time buyers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i can't afford my own home. i don't think i'm alone in this field. i am desperate to find a place of my own.

i am on a fairly low income, run a car and struggle with the cost of living. all of these factors don't help, but they don't tell the full story.

there are property developers all over the country buying up houses in affordable areas, refurbishing them and selling or renting them for a proffit. as a result of this, the value of other homes in that particular area go up in value, eventually pricing us first time buyers out of the market.

we need more schemes to build more affordable homes for ALL first time buyers, not just doctors, nurses and teachers. we all have the right to a roof over our heads

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
